title: 1 BEDROOM WEEKLY
posting_body: Emerald Suites at S. Las Vegas Blvd offers spacious 1 and 2 bedroom furnished apartments in Las Vegas, available weekly and extended-stay rentals with all the amenities you need to feel right at home.

Just minutes from Town Square, Las Vegas Premium Outlets, McCarran International Airport, and the Las Vegas Strip, this is the perfect option for those seeking leisure stays, and corporate housing in Las Vegas.

Weekly and extended-stay rates 1 & 2 Bedroom furnished suites*Kitchen with full-size stove, refrigerator, microwave, and dishwasher*Color TV with Cable channels, HBO, and ESPN included Complimentary Wifi internet access Free utilities!
Sparkling pool and spa Fitness facility 2 Laundry facilities, Free parking, On-site security, Pet friendly**Dog run
